attrs.script:
#!/bin/bash -xe

# Define variables
GO_VERSION=1.10.7
HL_ROOT=$HOME/go/src/github.com/hyperledger
USER=centos

# Install dependencies
sudo yum -y install bzip2 \
yum-utils \
device-mapper-persistent-data \
lvm2 \
git \
gcc \
gcc-c++ \
wget \
make

# Add docker-ce repo, install and enable docker service on startup
sudo yum-config-manager --add-repo https://download.docker.com/linux/centos/docker-ce.repo
sudo yum -y install docker-ce
sudo systemctl enable docker
sudo systemctl start docker

# Add privileges to run docker for $USER
sudo usermod -aG docker $USER
echo '{
    "live-restore": true,
    "group": "docker"
}' | sudo tee /etc/docker/daemon.json
sudo systemctl restart docker

# Install Fabric dependencies
## Go
wget https://dl.google.com/go/go${GO_VERSION}.linux-amd64.tar.gz && \
sudo tar -C /usr/local -xzf go${GO_VERSION}.linux-amd64.tar.gz
mkdir -p $HL_ROOT
echo -e 'export GOROOT=/usr/local/go \n
export GOPATH=$HOME/go \n
export PATH=$PATH:$GOROOT/bin'>>$HOME/.bash_profile
# sudo ln -s /usr/local/go/bin/go /usr/bin/go
source $HOME/.bash_profile
## Docker compose
curl -s --show-error --retry 5 https://bootstrap.pypa.io/get-pip.py | sudo python
sudo -H pip install requests --ignore-installed
sudo -H pip install docker-compose

#!/bin/bash -xe

# Define variables
HL_ROOT=$HOME/go/src/github.com/hyperledger
DELAY=0

# Setup Hyperledger Fabric
source $HOME/.bash_profile
sudo setenforce 0
curl -sSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/hyperledger/fabric/master/scripts/bootstrap.sh | bash -s 1.4.0
export PATH=$PATH:$HOME/fabric-samples/bin/
cd fabric-samples/first-network
sed -i 's/^askProceed/#&/g' byfn.sh # Remove user prompt for generate <mode> options
./byfn.sh generate
./byfn.sh up

action_list.description: System action for creating an application
action_list.name: action_create

action_list.description: System action for uninstalling an application
action_list.name: action_uninstall
